topics.name: Love
topics.description: God's love and love for others

verses.text: For Elohiym so loved the world...
Love is patient, love is kind...
Elohiym is love
Elohiym demonstrates His own love for us...
Love Yahuah your Elohiym with all your heart...
Faith is confidence in what we hope for...
Faith comes from hearing the message...
Faith by itself, if not accompanied by action...
Have faith in Elohiym
For by grace you have been saved through faith...
May the Elohiym of hope fill you with all joy...
Plans to give you hope and a future...
Put your hope in Elohiym...
Living hope through the resurrection...
Hope does not put us to shame...
The peace of Elohiym, which transcends understanding...
Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you...
Perfect peace for those whose minds are steadfast...
We have peace with Elohiym through Yahusha...
Let the peace of Messiah rule in your hearts...
The joy of Yahuah is your strength...
You fill me with joy in your presence...
That your joy may be complete...
Rejoice in Yahuah always...
Fill you with all joy and peace...
Pray continually...
In every situation, by prayer and petition...
Our Father in heaven, hallowed be your name...
The prayer of a righteous person is powerful...
Confidence in approaching Elohiym...
I can do all things through Him who strengthens me...
They will soar on wings like eagles...
My grace is sufficient for you...
Elohiym is our refuge and strength...
The joy of Yahuah is your strength...
He is faithful and just to forgive us...
Forgiving each other, just as Elohiym forgave you...
If you forgive others their trespasses...
As far as the east is from the west...
Forgive as Yahuah forgave you...
If any of you lacks wisdom, ask Elohiym...
Trust in Yahuah with all your heart...
The fear of Yahuah is the beginning of wisdom...
All the treasures of wisdom and knowledge...
For Yahuah gives wisdom...
By grace you have been saved through faith...
If you confess with your mouth...
Whoever believes in Him shall not perish...
Salvation is found in no one else...
He saved us, not by works...
Trust in Yahuah with all your heart...
When I am afraid, I put my trust in you...
Trust in Yahuah forever...
Yahuah is good, a refuge in times of trouble...
Commit your way to Yahuah; trust in Him...
I will instruct you and teach you the way...
In all your ways acknowledge Him...
Your ears will hear a voice behind you...
The Spirit will guide you into all truth...
Your word is a lamp to my feet...
